links.title: Preset: Establecimiento JJ
links.tooltip: Load dashboard with JJ devices selected

targets.query: SELECT last("temp") FROM "medicionesCO2" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$device$/ AND "sensor" =~ /^$sensor$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("moisture") FROM "medicionesCO2" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$device$/ AND "sensor" =~ /^$sensor$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("temp") FROM "medicionesCO2" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$device$/ AND "sensor" =~ /^$sensor$/) AND "temp" <100 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "sensor", "device" fill(null)
SELECT mean("hum") FROM "medicionesCO2" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$device$/ AND "sensor" =~ /^$sensor$/) AND "hum"<110 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "sensor", "device" fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "medicionesCO2" WITH KEY = "device"
